description_for_human: Sovereign hardware validation using WebGPU compute shaders.
description_for_model: Interface with GearVerify's client-side diagnostic tools. Note: All execution happens in the user's local browser context via WebAssembly/WebGPU.

endpoints.name: VALIDATE_GPU_COMPUTE
endpoints.description: Access the WebGPU Fused-Multiply-Add (FMA) stress test kernel.

endpoints.name: VALIDATE_CPU_LOGIC
endpoints.description: Access the multi-core integer and floating-point logic grid.

endpoints.name: AUDIT_MEMORY_VOLATILITY
endpoints.description: Access the memory bandwidth and integrity auditor.
